quote_first: “She’s dead,” he confirmed. “It must have been very sudden and with the minimum of pain.” He checked his watch; the time was
quote_last: . He covered his patient with a blanket and called for an ambulance.
quote_raw: “She’s dead,” he confirmed. “It must have been very sudden and with the minimum of pain.” He checked his watch; the time was 9:47. He covered his patient with a blanket and called for an ambulance.
title: Old Love
author: Jeffrey Archer

quote_last:
and nine forty-eight. They died at the same time.
"That's not the same time, Harry."
I waved a hand, impatient.
quote_raw:
Right. . . nine forty-seven and nine forty-eight. They died at the same time.
"That's not the same time, Harry."
I waved a hand, impatient.
title: Blood Rites
author: Jim Butcher

quote_first: For Hunter, who was trained to note times exactly, the final emergency started at
quote_raw: For Hunter, who was trained to note times exactly, the final emergency started at thirteen minutes to ten.
title: Elegy for a Revolutionary
author: C.J. Driver
